name: SummerAfterTenYears
description:
[Story]

Akira and Misaki always played together in their childhood.
One day, Misaki had to transfer to a school overseas for her parents' reasons.

They meet again in the summer of 10 years later.

[Game description]

You can switch between Japanese, English, Chinese, and Korean from the menu on the title screen.

[Story Mode]

Open World Game

The game is set in the beautiful summer countryside, rendered with the latest Unreal Engine.

The story mode can be easily cleared by following the path.

[HENTAI Mode]

In hentai mode, you can have sex with Misaki at home.

You can choose the size of the breasts so that both big-breasted and small-breasted lovers can enjoy.

The skin is made realistic by physical simulation!

Skin is reproduced down to the pores in 4k high quality!

Real-time 3D allows you to freely choose your viewpoint!

Click buttons on the UI menu for various operations.
Press the keyboard to turn off the UI menu, switch the camera, etc.

You can perform foreplay such as sucking and cunnilingus, hand job, blow job, oral ejaculation, and facial ejaculation,
For penetration, you can play 2 types of normal position, standing back, back, lying back, cowgirl position, and Nakadashi play in each position.

Facial ejaculation is simulated in real time, and the amount of juice applied to the face is different each time!

Some voices and sound effects are also played at random for a more realistic feel.

You can control the speed and intensity of blow jobs and other positions.
A subjective viewpoint is also available!

[Method of operation]

: Story mode

keyboard
W, A, S, D keys movement
LEFT SHIFT Run
Left CTRL crouching/standing switch
C key TPS/FPS viewpoint switching
Space key Jump
ESC key or P key Pause menu

controller
Left thumbstick movement
Left thumbstick button run
Right thumbstick button Crouch/stand toggle
Right trigger button TPS/FPS viewpoint switching
A button Jump
Y button pause menu

: Heantai Mode (controller not supported)

keyboard
M key UI menu ON/OFF
C key Camera switching
F key free camera

[How to operate the free camera]
keyboard
W, A, S, D keys movement
Space key rise
Left CTRL key down

[Voice Actor]

Akira CV: Shadow

Misaki Cv: A-chan

Sataru Cv: Daibutsu

[Music]

Title: 10 years later in the summer
Track by daholic

Shrine scene: The words I entrusted to my future self
Track by daholic

Ending: anohino sora
Track by AK BEATZ

*This work is a fiction. It is not related to any real people or organizations.

*This game is prohibited from live streaming.
